name: The Infinite R.E.D. Universe
description:
The Infinite R.E.D. Universe is a  game in which you pilot a spaceship and your objective is to recover the pieces of the mothership that are wandering in space. Just be careful of the enemies that come your way.

Oh.. and the initial version of the game (Demo 0.1) was made in a challenge to make a game within 4 hours.

(This game will have constant updates, so many things can change.)

Last update (02/16/2020):

  • DEMO 0.3
  • Added level system prototype,
  • Added Repair kit (When taking this item, a ship's engine will go back online),
  • Fixed UI,
  • Fixed some bugs.
